content: आरण्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ण्या, --ण्यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अरण्ये भवः ण्] Wild, forest-born, relating to a forest (<ab>opp.</ab> ग्राम्य); °पशुः <ls>Ms. 10. 48</ls>; (आरण्यपशु is of {7} kinds: --सरीसृपो रुरुश्चैव महिषो वानरस्तथा . पृषतर्क्षौ मृगश्चैव पशुर्वै सप्तधा मतः .) --ण्यः, --ण्यं {@--1@} A forest. {@--2@} A kind of corn growing without sowing seed. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of certain signs of the zodiac (see °राशि below). {@--4@} Cow-dung (--ण्यः only). {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Parvan in the Mahābhārata. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a Kāṇḍa in the Rāmāyaṇa.
